title: Storage WG Deputy Lead needed
shortDescription: Joystream Video DAO (https://joystream.org) is actively looking for a Storage WG Deputy Lead
description:
[Joystream Video DAO](https://joystream.org) is actively looking for a Storage WG Deputy Lead to join our [Pioneer Governance App](https://dao.joystream.org) community Storage team.

**Responsibilities:** 

Support lead in the day to day tasks including but not limited to:

- Preparing council period reports.

- Representing WG on DAO-wide meetings (Council handover, etc.) if the Lead is unavailable.

- Moderating storage Discord channel and updating Notion page

- Support lead in  monitoring and ensuring that Storage Providers are performing adequately

- Support lead analysing, evaluating and research the system capacity and develop steps and processes to improve and expand upon them

- Mentoring and train Storage WG members

- Develop and improve of monitoring systems and dashboards.

- Develop and improve of documentation systems and dashboards.

**Requirements:** 

- Storage Lead / Deputy / Worker experience is preferred

- High availability 

- Strong communication skills

- Proficiency in English

- Experience with how to setup and maintain blockchain nodes

- Having access to highly performant and reliable IT infrastructure (dedicated servers) with storage capacity of 25TB and more

**Skills:**

- Linux

- devops, Docker/Docker-compose

- Monitoring: Prometheus, Grafana, Elasticsearch

- scripting: bash, python or others

- nginx or Caddy

- GraphQl

**Rules for firings:** 

- If Deputy Lead says he is available but is nowhere to be found for 24h

- If Deputy Lead doesn't deliver on time, without even keeping lead informed

-https://github.com/Joystream/community-repo/tree/master/working-groups/storage-group/SOP

**About WG:** 

Notion page: https://www.notion.so/joystream/Storage-9dc5a16444934dc4bda08b596bc15375

Discord channel: https://discord.gg/fFRdNHsW

**Stake:** 

- $2500 (41,666 JOY)

**Salary:** 

- $1500 (25,000 JOY)/ month

- If an employee works fewer than 160 hours per month, the Council may reduce their pay according to the hourly rate and actual number of hours worked
